detect_all([N], [N2]) :- 
    detect_number(N, N2).
detect_all([N,O|T], [N2,O2|T2]) :- 
    langda(LLM:"Recursively get the number and the symbol that follows.").

almost_equal(X, Y) :- 
    ground(Y), 
    abs(X - Y) < 0.0001.

almost_equal(X, Y) :- 
    var(Y), 
    Y is float(X).

expression(Images, Result) :- 
    langda(LLM:"The main predicate that gets the final calculation result.").

parse([N], R) :- 
    almost_equal(N, R).

parse([N1,+|T], R) :-
    parse(T, R2),
    almost_equal(N1 + R2, R).

parse([N1,-|T], R) :-
    parse([-1, *|T], R2),
    almost_equal(N1 + R2, R).

parse([N1,*,N2|T], R) :-
    N3 is N1 * N2,
    parse([N3|T], R).

parse([N1,/,N2|T], R) :-
    N2 \== 0,
    N3 is N1 / N2,
    parse([N3|T], R).
